struct.exostring: last game won, player has not won third game
last game lost, player has not won third game

Initial Selected
This character is Furko Nellis in the cantina He is a Pazzak player. Sly He tracks: Initial selected Secondary selected, no games played Secondary selected, player lost last game Secondary selected, player won last game Secondary selected, player won three games
Tracks if last game was won or lost (no matter number game it was) Tracks if Player won 1, 2 or 3 games. Each game gets harder as he assumes the player to be more of a threat. He pays money to the player for each of the three victories. After the third victory, he will still play, but will not pay. He "respects" the player too much to do it for money at that point.
